poem:
Title: A Tryst with Dart Charge

Alas, the tollbooth's cryptic verse,
Dart Charge, you trade in mystery,
Your credits echo the universe,
Drawing funds with such artistry.

Thrice, nay, five times, you've played this game,
Silent amid my penned frustration, 
Invisible hands lay unseen claim,
Stoking the embers of vexation.

Oh Dart Charge, your silent manner,
Echoes in this dawn's sigh,
A poetic reminder, life's dark banner,
No invoice can simplify.
